Renaming Workspaces

You can rename public or private workspaces for a project database. You cannot rename the Root Workspace. Note that any changes you make to a public workspace affect everyone using it.

Note: Renaming your default workspace automatically resets the root workspace as your default.

To rename a workspace:

  1. Select File | Set Workspaces. The Set Workspaces dialog box appears with a list of all workspaces defined for the project database.

  2. Select the name of the workspace you want to rename from the list of workspaces.

  3. Click Rename. The Rename Workspace dialog box appears.

  4. Enter the new name for the workspace and click OK.

  5. Click OK to close the Set Workspaces dialog box.
